title: Hybrid may lose pull as clean power builds storage, says SECI chief
description: SECI is getting a lot of interest as states and distribution companies realize the implications of non-compliance of renewable purchase obligations, the agency's chief said. More interest is expected from states as prices of storage and demand-based auctions get more attractive, Gupta said, adding that the demand in the future will also depend on the establishment of renewable power as a reliable source of energy.
